rdf:Description.dc:description: Betting (7 min.) -- Motives, winning/losing (8 min.) -- Consequences (8 min.).
Producer/director, Brad Zipursky ; created by Brad Zipursky ; editor, Bridget Durnford ; animator, Mike Tomuk.

Explores adolescent gambling from the perspective of teens themselves. It reveals what they bet on, why they do it, what it feels like to win or lose, and what consequences they experience. It encourages viewer discussion of a range of topics by raising issues, protraying contrasting attitudes and experiences, but not prescribing solutions. Suitable for use in the classroom or with youth groups, with teens 13-17 years of age.
Explores adolescent gambling from the perspective of teens themselves.
